Reviews.Title: “there are better than the lowest price.”
Reviews.Author: Khaled M
Reviews.Content: Zain international hotel, Dubai, United Arabic Emirates. Assessment: there are better than the lowest price. Hotel rating: 3 stars. Advantages: -------- 1. parking. 2. (2) Elevator size small. 3. fax service is available. 4. conditioning. 5. hygiene is acceptable. 6. reminder service is available. Observations. ------------- 1. bad deal reception desk staff. ؟؟؟؟؟؟ 2. determination of the reception desk to retain Passport guests. ؟؟؟؟؟؟ 3. very small reception lounge. 4. you need hotel management skill training courses dealing with tourists. _ 5. no laundry service (washing). 6. Internet rooms are not available. 7. slow when lock algsab receptionists?????? 8. the size of a small room (15 m 2). 9. high price comparing to other hotels like.!!!! 10. don't recommend only when necessary. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ With greetings from Khalid.

Reviews.Title: “The cheapest place to sleep”
Reviews.Author: TTB_12
Reviews.Content: I stayed here because my flight was delayed for 12 hours. The ac did not work, many of the outlets did not work, the hotel was shabby but that's why it was the lowest price room I could find. The bed linens were relatively clean. Also, they will attempt to keep your passport. I didn't let them.

Reviews.Title: “AVOID AVOID PRICING IS A CON RIP OFF”
Reviews.Author: Truebrits
Reviews.Content: Arrived after a long flight and gave receptionist email booking confirmation via booking.com. Insisted had booked 1x triple and 1xdouble yet our confirmation showed 1 single room and 1 double as needed. Made us pay over 900 aed more than what email confirmed as price blaming booking.com but wouldn't show what confirmation he had received from them. RUDE & ARROGANT, CLEARLY CAN'T READ ENGLISH Just a MONEY MAKING CON.AVOID UNLESS WANT TO BE ROBBED! ABSOLUTLEY DISGUSTING BAD SERVICE!

Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend this to couples”
Reviews.Author: Sahira M
Reviews.Content: Was supposed to stay at this hotel for 5 days but after 1 night checked out and went to a much nicer hotel that was way cheaper.... the hotel is ok itself but the day staff is very rude to the point that they were laughing in our faces and being so horrible..... the were very unhelpful and just blantantly rude and due to their behaviour we left after one night..

Reviews.Title: “Great price for your money”
Reviews.Author: kchat2
Reviews.Content: Close to the airport and centre city shopping mall.

Reviews.Title: “great location”
Reviews.Author: taqi
Reviews.Content: my husband and i stayed at this hotel for his birthday, Firstly the location is great theres a supermarket right next door and a chain of fast food takeaways, restaurants internet cafes.... just minutes away. the gotel is fairly good for a 3 star very clean with okish decor. dont bother having breakfast in the hotel as its far too expensive and you have so many cafes out there. i got a very good deal 70 kwid a night normal rate 130 so if your rate is good then go for it if not then i would say look elsewhere as 130 is a bit 2 much for what it is. also no wireless and no tea coffees in the rooms. staff very polite and bilingual.

HotelInfo.Name: Zain International Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Al Rigga Rd | P.O.Box 32685, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
